job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongSoftware EngineerstrongppbrppAre you a fullstack developer with React Rails Node or Python experience The Gnar Company is seeking multiple developers to join our growing 20 person remote team Your typical day will include shipping code on your active client project and interacting with client partners to promote standard methodologies and process improvements Applicants must be US basedppbrppstrongABOUT USstrongppWe help companies solve their Gnarly problems From small oneperson startups to enterprises we help businesses level up their teams hone in on their process and ship the right features at the right time You will be joining an experienced team and will be instrumental in crafting our company culture and team values Our new office is located in Downtown Crossing Boston and offers great views of the city and lots of natural light We are growing quickly and this role presents an excellent opportunity to grow with us We value a strong worklife balance when you are off work its your timeppbrppstrongABOUT YOUstrongpulliYou are a software engineer with multiple years of professional experienceliliYou are comfortable working in a wide range of industries platforms and project sizesliliYou care about your craft and actively seek to improve your skills and share your takeaways with othersliliYou love the technology you already know and are always eager to learn moreliulpbrppstrongRESPONSIBILITIESstrongppFrom day one youll be working with our clients to build high quality foundational web applications You will build scalable software that helps businesses in various industries including healthcare FinTech and cybersecurity Youll have full autonomy to influence the scope of the engagement the technology decisions and the delivery of the product We use a range of technologies includingpulliRubyRailsliliTypescriptliliReactReact NativeliliPythonliliWeve also dabbled in other technologies such as Elixir Go and NodeliulpbrppWe pride ourselves on good development process team collaboration and clean well tested codeppbrppstrongBENEFITSstrongpulliA competitive salaryliliA gnarly remote teamliliA generous employee profit sharing programliliA mandatory vacation policyliliPaid team luncheslili100 healthcare amp dental coverageliliA generous paid maternitypaternity leave policyliliFully company paid phone plan for both business and personal useliliNew coding setup of your choosingliliA fun work anniversary prize every yearliulpbrppSalary 100K  130Kppbrpp Sorry no sponsored visasp
